Title: Requires that all terrain vehicles only be filled with gas when on a tow or trailer
Summary: Requires that all terrain vehicles only be filled with gas when on a tow or trailer; requires gas stations to post signs indicating to customers that an ATV needs to be on a tow or trailer before filling it with gas.
LawCode: Amd ยง2404, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring that all terrain vehicles only be filled with gas when on a tow or trailer
